description: Scene to show the parametrization of the `KHR_materials_iridescence` extension with a metallic base material. The three dimensions of the scene are:
* Material Color: base color of the metallic base material
* Thin Film Thickness: the thickness of the thin-film layer in nm
* Thin Film IOR: index of refraction of the thin-film layer
name: Iridescence Metallic Spheres
summary: Tests KHR_materials_iridescence on a metallic material.
